faq.title: Got Questions?
faq.subtitle: We’ve got answers to your most common cleaning concerns.

items.question: What is included in a standard cleaning service?
items.answer: A standard cleaning service includes dusting, vacuuming, mopping, and cleaning of all surfaces in the kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms, and living areas. We also empty trash bins and make beds.

items.question: Are your cleaning products safe for pets and children?
items.answer: Yes, we use eco-friendly and non-toxic cleaning products that are safe for your entire family, including pets and children. We prioritize your health and safety.

items.question: Do I need to be home during the cleaning?
items.answer: No, you do not need to be home. Many of our clients provide us with a key or a code to enter their home. Our team is fully vetted and insured for your peace of mind.

items.question: How long will the cleaning take?
items.answer: The duration of the cleaning depends on the size of your home and the type of service you have requested. We can provide an estimated time frame when you book your service.

items.question: What if I am not satisfied with the service?
items.answer: Your satisfaction is our guarantee. If you are not satisfied with our service, please contact us within 24 hours, and we will return to re-clean the specific areas at no extra cost.

hero.title: About Sodax Clean
hero.subtitle: We are dedicated to providing exceptional cleaning services that create healthier, more comfortable environments for our clients.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded with a simple mission: to provide Sydney residents and businesses with reliable, high-quality cleaning services they can trust. We understand that a clean space is more than just aesthetics – it is about creating a healthy environment for you, your family, or your employees.
story.content2: From our humble beginnings as a small team of passionate cleaners, we have grown to serve hundreds of satisfied customers across Sydney. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction remains at the heart of everything we do.
story.content3: Every member of our team shares our core values: integrity, attention to detail, and a genuine passion for creating pristine spaces.
